dmca.title: copyright infringement claim
dmca.body:
_____  

From: vexare [mailto:vexare@charter.net] 
Sent: Friday, April 01, 2005 12:55 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Chris at Big Smoo
Subject: copyright infringement claim


Sir or Madam:

A "whois" lookup of 70.85.42.70 indicates that your ISP, ThePlanet.com, is
hosting a website (www.thelanceyoungerband.com) that I believe is hosted by
your ISP.
This belief is based upon a trace that yielded the following report: 
 

Tracing route to thelanceyoungerband.com [70.85.42.70]...

hop         rtt         rtt         rtt                   ip address         domain name        
1         0         0         0                   216.46.228.229
port-216-3073253-es128.devices.datareturn.com        
2         0         0         0                   64.29.192.145
port-64-1949841-zzt0prespect.devices.datareturn.com        
3         0         0         0                   64.29.192.226
daa.g921.ispb.datareturn.com        
4         0         0         0                   168.215.241.133
hagg-01-ae0-1001.dlfw.twtelecom.net        
5         0         0         0                   168.215.241.150                 
6         0         0         0                   70.85.127.29
dist-vlan31.dsr3-1.dllstx3.theplanet.com        
7         10         0         0                   70.85.127.67
dist-vlan21.dsr1-1.dllstx2.theplanet.com        
8         0         0         10                   12.96.160.36
po-2.car11-1.dllstx2.theplanet.com        
9         0         0         10                   70.85.42.70
70.70-85-42.reverse.theplanet.com        

Trace complete  

Per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (the "DMCA"), codified at
17 U.S.C.
